name: 鄭國忠
objective: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
schedule:
Weeks 1-2
Gel Permeation Chromatography, GPC
Week 3-4
Differential Scanning Calorimetry, DSC
Week 5
Thermogravimetric Analysis,TGA
Week 6,7
Dynamic Mechanical Analysis, DMA
Week 8
Rheometer
Week 9: Mid-Exam.
Weeks 10-17
分析實例
Week 18: Final-Exam.
scorePolicy:
Mid-exam: 30
Final-exam: 40
Class Attendance and Homework: 30-
Max.:100
materials:
Polymer Chemistry, An introduction, 3rd. Ed.
Malcolm P. Stevens
Polymers: Chemistry and Physics of Modern Materials, 2nd Ed.,
J. M. G. Cowie,.

Final-exam: 0-50%
Report: 0~100%

-20~+30% 
Max.:100
